definition: Black Whirlwind, nickname of 李逵[Li3 Kui2], known for his fearsome behavior in combat and his dark complexion
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

sentences.english: In which Chinese classical novel is Li Kui, nicknamed "The Black Whirlwind", a character?

definition: lit. a girl changes eighteen times between childhood and womanhood (idiom)/fig. a young woman is very different from the little girl she once was
to steal the show/to grab the limelight
a person who looks drenched and bedraggled/like a drowned rat/deep distress
